data.title: Dive into anything
data.text:
The man was behind Deep Rising, Van Helsing and the Mummy trilogy with Brendan Fraser, so why has he gone quiet? Has Hollywood turned it's back on him? Is he semi-retired? You would think the streamers would jump at the chance of him directing big monster movies. What is going on?

The man was behind Deep Rising, Van Helsing and the Mummy trilogy with Brendan Fraser, so why has he gone quiet? Has Hollywood turned it's back on him? Is he semi-retired? You would think the streamers would jump at the chance of him directing big monster movies. What is going on?
